mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mason, Armistead Thompson, 1787-1819
mdRecord.dcterms:description: By order of meeting [of Republicans of Loudon county] transmits to him the enclosed duplicate of their proceedings. Enclosure of 1809 February 13, by Republicans of Loudoun County: Met on Feb 13 to send address to President; compliments government on resistance to belligerents of Europe; wish him happiness on his retirement to private life; signed by Secretary Armistead T. Mason.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1809 February 14, Leesburg, Loudoun County, [Virginia] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
